haxel.HxlMonitor

type
class
A simple class for aggregating and averaging data.

Constructor

public new(Size : Int, ?Default : Int)
parameters
Size The desired size - more entries means a longer window of averaging.
Default The default value of the entries in the array (0 by default).
Creates the monitor array and sets the size.

Instance Variables

private _data : Array<Float>

An array to hold all the data we are averaging.

private _itr : Int

Keeps track of where we are in the array.

private _size : Int

Stores the requested size of the monitor array.

Instance Methods

public add(Data : Float) : Void

parameters
Data The value you want to track and average.
Adds an entry to the array of data.

public average() : Float

returns
The average value of all the numbers in the monitor window.
Averages the value of all the numbers in the monitor window.
